fields.description: Indicates the activity type the detected risk is linked to. The possible values are signin, user, unknownFutureValue.
fields.name: Activity

fields.description: Date and time that the risky activity occurred. The DateTimeOffset type represents date and time information using ISO 8601 format and is always in UTC time. For example, midnight UTC on Jan 1, 2014 is 2014-01-01T00:00:00Z
fields.name: ActivityDateTime

fields.description: Additional information associated with the risk detection in JSON format.
fields.name: AdditionalInfo

fields.description: Correlation ID of the sign-in associated with the risk detection. This property is null if the risk detection is not associated with a sign-in.
fields.name: CorrelationId

fields.description: Date and time that the risk was detected. The DateTimeOffset type represents date and time information using ISO 8601 format and is always in UTC time. For example, midnight UTC on Jan 1, 2014 is 2014-01-01T00:00:00Z
fields.name: DetectedDateTime

fields.description: Timing of the detected risk (real-time/offline). The possible values are notDefined, realtime, nearRealtime, offline, unknownFutureValue.
fields.name: DetectionTimingType

fields.description: Provides the IP address of the client from where the risk occurred.
fields.name: IPAddress

fields.description: Date and time that the risk detection was last updated.
fields.name: LastUpdatedDateTime

fields.description: Location of the sign-in.
fields.name: Location

fields.description: Request ID of the sign-in associated with the risk detection. This property is null if the risk detection is not associated with a sign-in.
fields.name: RequestId

fields.description: Details of the detected risk. The possible values are: none, adminGeneratedTemporaryPassword, userPerformedSecuredPasswordChange, userPerformedSecuredPasswordReset, adminConfirmedSigninSafe, aiConfirmedSigninSafe, userPassedMFADrivenByRiskBasedPolicy, adminDismissedAllRiskForUser, adminConfirmedSigninCompromised, hidden, adminConfirmedUserCompromised, unknownFutureValue, adminConfirmedServicePrincipalCompromised, adminDismissedAllRiskForServicePrincipal, m365DAdminDismissedDetection. Note that you must use the Prefer: include - unknown -enum-members request header to get the following value(s) in this evolvable enum: adminConfirmedServicePrincipalCompromised , adminDismissedAllRiskForServicePrincipal , m365DAdminDismissedDetection. Note: Details for this property are only available for Microsoft Entra ID P2 customers. P1 customers will be returned hidden.
fields.name: RiskDetail

fields.description: The type of risk event detected. The possible values are adminConfirmedUserCompromised, anomalousUserActivity, anonymizedIPAddress,attackerinTheMiddle,attemptedPRTAccess, generic, investigationsThreatIntelligence, investigationsThreatIntelligenceSigninLinked,leakedCredentials, maliciousIPAddress, maliciousIPAddressValidCredentialsBlockedIP, malwareInfectedIPAddress, mcasImpossibleTravel,mcasFinSuspiciousFileAccess, mcasSuspiciousInboxManipulationRules,nationStateIP, suspiciousAPITraffic, suspiciousIPAddress,suspiciousSendingPatterns,   unfamiliarFeatures, unlikelyTravel, userReportedSuspiciousActivity.  For more information about each value, see Risk types and detection.
fields.name: RiskEventType

fields.description: Level of the detected risk. The possible values are low, medium, high, hidden, none, unknownFutureValue. Note: Details for this property are only available for Microsoft Entra ID P2 customers. P1 customers will be returned hidden.
fields.name: RiskLevel

fields.description: The state of a detected risky user or sign-in. The possible values are none, confirmedSafe, remediated, dismissed, atRisk, confirmedCompromised, and unknownFutureValue.
fields.name: RiskState

fields.description: List of risk event types.Note: This property is deprecated. Use riskEventType instead.
fields.name: RiskType

fields.description: Source of the risk detection. For example, activeDirectory.
fields.name: Source

fields.description: Indicates the type of token issuer for the detected sign-in risk. The possible values are AzureAD, ADFederationServices, and unknownFutureValue.
fields.name: TokenIssuerType

fields.description: Name of the user.
fields.name: UserDisplayName

fields.description: Unique ID of the user.  The DateTimeOffset type represents date and time information using ISO 8601 format and is always in UTC time. For example, midnight UTC on Jan 1, 2014 is 2014-01-01T00:00:00Z
fields.name: UserId

fields.description: The user principal name (UPN) of the user.
fields.name: UserPrincipalName
